link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

va:valueAssertion.test: round( $V1 *100) div 100 = (if ($V3 != 0) then (round (( $V2 div $V3 )*100) div 100) else 0)

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Leverage Ratio (LR) should be equal to "Outside Liabilities/Adjusted Net Worth" do not tally.

Identity "Investment in equity shares, preference shares, bonds, debentures, debt or loans in group companies as a percentage of net assets (%) =Investment in equity shares, preference shares, bonds, debentures, debt or loans in group companies/Net assets" do not tally.

Identity "Investments in equity shares (including instruments compulsorily convertible into equity shares within a period not exceeding 10 years from the date of issue) in group companies and units of Infrastructure Investment Trust only as sponsors as a percentage of net assets = Investments in equity shares (including instruments compulsorily convertible into equity shares within a period not exceeding 10 years from the date of issue) in group companies and units of Infrastructure Investment Trust only as sponsors / Net assets" do not tally.
Identity "Gross Non Performing Assets percentage = Gross Non Performing Assets /Net assets" do not tally.
Identity "Net Non Performing Assets percentage = Net Non Performing Assets/Net assets" do not tally.

If the reported value is "No" in "Whether the company is purely into investment activities without any customer interface?" then details in "(a) If No, Please provide the details on type of customer interface had by the company and other relevant details" is required and if the reported value is "Yes" then information is not required.

If the reported value is "Yes" in row "Whether the company was holding any Public Deposits as on March 31 of reporting financial year" then amount is required for "(a) If Yes, Please furnish the amount" and if the reported value is "No", then no amount is required.

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'No') then (not(empty($V2))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'Yes') then (empty($V2)) else "false") and (if ($V1 = 'Not Applicable') then (empty($V2)) else "false")

generic:link.msg:message: If the reported value is "No" for "Has the company transferred a sum not less than 20% of its Net Profit for the year to Reserve Fund? (in terms of Sec 45-IC of the RBI Act, 1934)." then details is required in "If No, Please provide the reasons for the same" and if the reported value is "Yes" or "Not Applicable" then details not required.

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'true') then (not(empty( $V2)) and not(empty( $V3))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'false') then (empty($V2) and empty($V3)) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message:
"Reporting of ""(a) If Yes, what is amount received in the form of FDI during reporting financial year (Amount Rs. in lakhs)"" and ""(b) If Yes, did the company fully complied with all the extant directions, terms and conditions of FDI"" is mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" for ""Has the company received any FDI?"".
Reporting of ""(a) If Yes, what is amount received in the form of FDI during reporting financial year (Amount Rs. in lakhs)"" and ""(b) If Yes, did the company fully complied with all the extant directions, terms and conditions of FDI"" is not mandatory, If user selects ""No"" for ""Has the company received any FDI?""."

If the reported value is "Yes" for "Whether the company made any Overseas Investment during the Financial Year and/ or is having Overseas Investment as on March 31 of financial year for which data is reported" then information is required for "(a) If Yes, did the company fully comply with all the conditions stipulated under applicable Master Direction DNBR. PD. 008/03.10.119/2016-17 and Master Direction DNBR.PD.007/03.10.119/2016-17" otherwise information is not required.

If the reported value is "Yes" for "Whether the company participated in the Interest Rate Future Markets as clients during the financial year?" then amount is required for "(a) If Yes, please furnish the total notional principal amount of Interest Rate Future transactions entered into as clients during the year under reference" otherwise amount is not required.

If the reported value is "Yes" for "Whether the NBFC participated in the Interest Rate Future Markets as trading members during the financial year?" then amount is required for "(a) If Yes, please furnish the total notional principal amount of Interest Rate Future transactions entered into as trading member during the year under reference" otherwise amount is not required.

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'true') then (not(empty( $V2)) and not(empty( $V3))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'false') then (empty($V2) and empty($V3)) else "false")

generic:link.msg:message: If the reported value is "Yes" for "Whether the equity of the company is listed on any of the Stock Exchanges?" then informatons are required for "If Yes, (a) Name of the Stock Exchange" and "(b) Date of first Listing" otherwise information is not required.

Reporting of "(a) If Yes, whether requisite prior written permission from RBI was taken?" and "(b) Date of latest prior permission, if taken" is mandatory, if user selects "Yes" for "Has there been any takeover/acquisition of control/ change in shareholding/ Management during the year which required prior approval from RBI?"

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'true') then (not(empty( $V2)) and not(empty( $V3))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'false') then (empty($V2) and empty($V3)) else "false")

generic:link.msg:message: If the reported value is "Yes" for "Whether the Statutory Auditor is appointed by the company in the past?" then informations are required for "If Yes, please share the details the previous contract From Date" and "If Yes, please share the details the previous contract To Date" and if the reported value is "No" then information is not required.

"Reporting of ""If YES, Please furnish the reasons for such non-compliance"" is mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" for ""Whether the Company trade in its investments in shares, bonds, debentures, debt or loans in group companies except through block sale for the purpose of dilution or disinvestment"".
Reporting of ""If YES, Please furnish the reasons for such non-compliance"" is not mandatory, If user selects ""No"" for ""Whether the Company trade in its investments in shares, bonds, debentures, debt or loans in group companies except through block sale for the purpose of dilution or disinvestment""."

"Reporting of ""If YES, Please furnish the reasons for such non-compliance"" is mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" for ""Whether the company carry on any other financial activity referred to in Section 45I(c) and 45I(f) of the RBI act, 1934 except investment in bank deposits, money market instruments, government securities, loans to and investments in debt issuances of group companies or guarantees issued on behalf of group companies?""
Reporting of ""If YES, Please furnish the reasons for such non-compliance"" is not mandatory, If user selects ""No"" for ""Whether the company carry on any other financial activity referred to in Section 45I(c) and 45I(f) of the RBI act, 1934 except investment in bank deposits, money market instruments, government securities, loans to and investments in debt issuances of group companies or guarantees issued on behalf of group companies?"".

"Reporting of (b) Date of latest prior permission, if taken"" is mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" for ""whether requisite prior written permission from RBI was taken?"".
Reporting of (b) Date of latest prior permission, if taken"" is not mandatory, If user selects ""No"" for ""whether requisite prior written permission from RBI was taken?"""

Reporting of "(a) If Yes, whether requisite prior written permission from RBI was taken?" and "(b) Date of latest prior permission, if taken" is not mandatory, if user selects "No" for "Has there been any takeover/acquisition of control/ change in shareholding/ Management during the year which required prior approval from RBI?"
